snippet.title: Abyssus - New Gameplay and Demo Reveal| FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
FGS Live From GDC revealed new gameplay for Abyssus, a fast-paced cooperative FPS and roguelite adventure, as well as an upcoming demo for the game coming in April 2025. Abyssus will feature 4-player co-op action, alongside highly customisable weapons and armaments. The gameplay focuses on FPS action in a surreal brinepunk, Atlantis-esque civilization. Abyssus is coming soon to Steam.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #Abyssus #gdc

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
